Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • NPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoneyPlant, XYPlant, Zombie

    public abstract class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    13 October, 2018, 17 October, 2018 NPC is a Non-Player Character which could be any kind of a plant or a zombie
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)
